H0.text: Mark Bolland is the current Dutch born CEO of which retail chain. Tesco

H1.text: Mark Bolland is the current Dutch born CEO of which retail chain. Sainsbury's

H2.text: Mark Bolland is the current Dutch born CEO of which retail chain. Asda

H3.text: Mark Bolland is the current Dutch born CEO of which retail chain. M&S

A4.text: In October 2019, Tesco announced that CEO Dave Lewis would step down in 2020, and would be succeeded by Ken Murphy.

A5.text: In 2016, Marc Bolland stepped down as CEO of M&S and was replaced by Steve Rowe.

A6.text: In 2022, Stuart Machin was appointed managing director of Food at M&S, succeeding Steve Rowe.
